metadata.name: Everybody Breaks PT1
metadata.description:
The aim here is to extended the life of this temporary site specific piece through the use of high fidelity 3D scanning and visualization software.
With the use of archival technologies the piece retains certain material and gestural qualities indicative of the handmade.

This intersection of technologies, both old and more current, present us with a form of digital regurgitation that layers 'realities' and presents its own material language.
